Title: Honest & Trustworthy
Content:
I sold a camera lens online to Wex after receiving quotes from a few camera stores.
They offered Â£305 based on my own rating of the camera condition, and this was subject to their checks of the lens.
I was pleasantly surprised to be paid Â£315 instead, presumably as the lens was in better condition than I had ranked it.
Clearly a very honest, trustworthy company that isn't in it just for the cash.

Title: Sony A7RV purchase
Content:
I decided to trade in my Nikon equipment for a Sony A7RV kit and the process was so easy with a very fair offer for my kit of which i accepted.
I decided to take my kit to the Whitechapel store in person and was greeted by a staff member who really looked after me and advised with great knowledge of product.After receiving my final quote i was more than happy and called the store to arrange my new purchase of which i ended up buying two more lenses and a 2 x converter( might as well go whole hog )
I want to thank the staff member who looked after me from start to finish and couldn't be more helpful and friendly. A big shout out to staff member "Rukon Miah"
thanks mate for a great buying experience 10/10

Title: The delivery service from Wex was far from what was to be expected.
Content:
The service from Wex was very good in the way my orders were processed. The reason why I am giving only a rating of three stars (I would give none but for the excellence of making the order and ease of payment)
The bad rating was for the appalling service of your delivery carriers. Four times I have submeitted and four times I have received emails stating that the driver could not deliver the each package package. Whis is strange because they did not try to make a delivery. The photograpkic evidence they sent to back up their fabrication of an attemped delivery were not of my address at all. I wanr the package to be delivered to the office where I work. Being disabled I cannot easily get about to a "Drop off " point and I am not at my home address during the day.
The delivery drivers did not even try to ring me to tell me that they were lost and could not find me.
Thanks to this , I did not receive deliveries when they should have and as a result I had to cancell a shoot ( costing me money).
Once I could understand , but four times!
Please do not use this carrier for any future orders I may submit, if this cannot be done then you have lost a customer.
sincerely 
Jeff
